Room.Name: A Wide Path
Room.Description: A stone pathway has been cut into the forest floor.

Room.Name: Beneath a Massive Slab of Rock
Beneath a Massive Slab of Rock
Room.Description: A stone pathway has been cut into the forest floor.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Encampment
Room.Description: Scores of elves, human and dwarven bodies have been heaped into a mound near a broken part of the gate.

Room.Name: Beneath a Massive Slab of Rock
On the Western Battlement Wall
Room.Description: No southern battlement walls are needed because the hillock fortifications have been built against a massive slab of rock to the south.

Room.Name: A Heavily-Fortified Camp
Room.Description: A barracks here with a set of stairs against the western wall of the fortifications.

Room.Name: A Wide Path Covered in Blood and Snow
Room.Description: This broad, snow-covered pass runs north and south between two twisted, jagged mountain peaks which hover above you menacingly. Several fierce battles have clearly been fought here over the past few weeks, as the ground is littered with the dead. Not far to the north, you can see what appears to have once been a massive stronghold, or fortress. Now though, the walls have been shattered and the gate itself, made of solid stone, blasted to rubble. The high walls and massive size of this citadel in the mountains indicate it was built by the race of giants, and the great plumes of smoke rising speak of a large army still within.

Room.Name: A Wide Path Covered in Blood and Snow
Room.Description: This broad, snow-covered pass runs north and south between two twisted, jagged mountain peaks which hover above you menacingly. Several fierce battles have clearly been fought here over the past few weeks, as the ground is littered with the dead. Not far to the north, you can see what appears to have once been a massive stronghold, or fortress. Now though, the walls have been shattered and the gate itself, made of solid stone, blasted to rubble. The high walls and massive size of this citadel in the mountains indicate it was built by the race of giants, and the great plumes of smoke rising speak of a large army still within.

Room.Name: Before the Ruined Southern Gate
Room.Description: You stand before a shattered main gate set into the southern wall of a massive stronghold made of stone and mortar. The high walls and massive size of this citadel indicate it was built by the race of giants, and the great plumes of smoke rising from behind its walls speak of a large army still within. The sound of men shouting can be heard coming from the north, and you can see a host of activity through the crumbled gate. South of you, a broad path stretches away covered in snow.

Room.Name: The Crumbling Ruins of the Southern Gate
Room.Description: You stand amidst the rubble of the blasted south gate, set into the southern wall of a massive stronghold, which rises up thirty feet above you to the east and west. The sound of men shouting can be heard coming from the north, and you can see a host of activity to the north. The acrid smell of death fills the nostrils here, lingering heavily over a mound of bodies that have been heaped against the crumbled gate. Broken carts and half-dug trenches are scattered all across the open space between the scorched walls of the stronghold, making it somewhat difficult to maneuver about.

Room.Name: A Large, Decimated Square
Room.Description: Standing just inside the blasted southern gates of this stronghold, you see that whatever destroyed the southern wall left the inside of this citadel in no better condition. This massive city of giants, once with fifty-foot, two story buildings throughout, has been reduced to rubble and ash, the roads cleared only enough to support a vigorous war. Here in one of the main squares of the fortress, fortifications have been added to already fallen stone blocks to make it difficult for an invading force to force their way through in great numbers. The square continues to the north, east and west, while the blasted gates lie in ruin to the south. Recent mountain snow has been packed down hard by the trampling of hundreds of boots.

Room.Name: A Large, Decimated Square
Room.Description: This massive city of giants, once with fifty-foot, two story buildings throughout, has been reduced to rubble and ash, with several areas of the south central square being cleared to make room for fighting. The square continues to the north and south where you can see the blasted gates lying in ruin. Recent mountain snow has been packed down hard by the trampling of hundreds of boots. Here in one of the main squares of the fortress, fortifications have been added to already fallen stone statues and other monuments to make it difficult for an invading force to force their way through in great numbers. Heavy wreckage and debris makes it impossible to continue through the square to your east or west.

Room.Name: A Large, Decimated Square
Room.Description: This massive city of giants, once with fifty-foot, two story buildings throughout, has been reduced to rubble and ash, with several areas of the south central square being cleared to make room for fighting. Here in one of the main squares of the fortress, fortifications have been added to already fallen stone statues and other monuments to make it difficult for an invading force to force their way through in great numbers. The ground is littered with broken weapons and armor, tossed aside or lost by those desparately fighting for their lives. The debris and various statues here are all stained with the blood of countless soldiers.

Room.Name: Intersection of a Broad Street in Ruins
A Squalid Home
Room.Description: The floors of this house are strewn with the detritus of lives let go, ankle-deep with abandoned possessions.

Room.Name: A Filthy Tavern
Room.Description: Much of this tavern is stewing in a putrid mix of filth and corpses.

Room.Name: A Broken Avenue Beneath the Ramparts
A Broken Avenue Beneath the Ramparts
A Broken Avenue Beneath the Ramparts
A Large, Decimated Square
Room.Description: The ground is littered with broken weapons and armor, tossed aside or lost by those desparately fighting for their lives. The debris and various statues here are all stained with the blood of countless soldiers as well. Fortifications have been added to already fallen stone statues and other monuments to make it difficult for an invading force to force their way through in great numbers. Standing in the northern side of this rubble-strewn square, the air is filled with ashen smoke and the acrid smell of death. Men can be heard shouting orders, as well as moaning in agony, nearby. The rubble is too heavy to the north and west to pass this way, but you can continue along the square to the east and south.

Room.Name: A Large, Decimated Square
Room.Description: Standing in the northern side of this rubble-strewn square, the air is filled with ashen smoke and the acrid smell of death. Men can be heard shouting orders, as well as moaning in agony, nearby. The ground is littered with broken weapons and armor, tossed aside or lost by those desparately fighting for their lives. The debris and various statues here are all stained with the blood of countless soldiers as well. Fortifications have been added to already fallen stone statues and other monuments to make it difficult for an invading force to force their way through in great numbers. The rubble is too heavy to the north and south to pass through, but you can continue along the square to the east and west.

Room.Name: A Large, Decimated Square
Room.Description: Standing in the northern side of this rubble-strewn square, the air is filled with ashen smoke and the acrid smell of death. Men can be heard shouting orders, as well as moaning in agony, nearby. The rubble is too heavy to the north to pass this way, but you can continue along the square to the east and west and to the south, a massive crater has been blasted into the very grounds of the square itself. The ground is littered with broken weapons and armor, tossed aside or lost by those desparately fighting for their lives. The debris and various statues here are all stained with the blood of countless soldiers as well. Fortifications have been added to already fallen stone statues and other monuments to make it difficult for an invading force to force their way through in great numbers.

Exit.Description: The edge of the decimated square continues this way.
Rubble and debris give way to a massive hole in the square. You think you can make your way along the edge of it to the south.
The debris and broken monuments have been cleared to form a large crossroads ahead.

Room.Name: A Large, Decimated Square
Room.Description: Standing in the northern side of this rubble-strewn square, the air is filled with ashen smoke and the acrid smell of death. Men can be heard shouting orders, as well as moaning in agony, nearby. The ground is littered with broken weapons and armor, tossed aside or lost by those desparately fighting for their lives. The debris and various statues here are all stained with the blood of countless soldiers as well. Fortifications have been added to already fallen stone statues and other monuments to make it difficult for an invading force to force their way through in great numbers. The rubble is too heavy to the north-east to pass this way, but you can continue along the square to the south and west along the edge of the square.

A Small Shaft
Room.Description: No light penetrates from below this dark shaft.

NPC.name: Niolas Famo Amber Occultist
NPC.description: A slim man stand before you eminating power. He is covered with a black robe embroidered with ancient runes made of Amber. His skin is thin and pale as that of death. Through the paleness of his skin you can see blood flowing through a network of blue veins. His eyes are bleak, varing in color from dusty brown to dirty white. They seem to be slightly of focus as if not paying attention to immediate mundane surroundings.
NPC.longDescription: The Amber Occultist stands here perfecting his craft.
NPC.shortDescription: Niolas te Famo the Amber Occultist
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea NoAlign Gain AreaAttack

Item.Name: stiff corpse bloodless
Item.LongDescription: A stiff and frozen corpse lies half-buried in the snow, a few feet from the path.

ExtraDescription.Description: Half-bured in the snow, this corpse is clearly long dead. Emaciated and torn, its flesh has mostly been ripped apart by the scavengers of these mountains.

Item.Name: hundreds bodies mound
Item.ShortDescription: the mound of the mutilated and decapitated
Item.LongDescription: Scores of elves, human and dwarven bodies have been heaped into a mound near a broken part of the gate.

ExtraDescription.Keyword: scores bodies elves humans dwarves mound
ExtraDescription.Description: Scores of bodies have been heaped into a pile carelessly, though a pile of shattered wood nearby leads one to believe they may be burned soon. Some of the corpses have clearly been left for weeks or even months, as you notice much of the flesh is gone with most of them, leaving only the haunting grins of mangled skulls to emulate whatever screams must have before.

Item.Name: wooden cart
Item.LongDescription: A wooden cart with a shattered wheel leans on its side here.

ExtraDescription.Description: This abandoned cart has been left to rot, near a huge pile of dead bodies. Perhaps it was once used to haul away the deceased to some other location.
